page.title: 02Modern Churches,Bromley S.E.
page.content: t.Mary's,Green Street Green,C of E,was uilt in 1937.The congregation is made up of local people,and there are 15 marriages and 30 christenings a year on average. Christ Church,C of E,was built in 1940. It has chairs instead of pews, and one stained glass window. Chelsfield Methodist Church was built in 1967 and has 150 chairs.There is no choir. The Roman Catholic community is served by Holy Innocents,a tall imposing building with a black slated roof.This won the Architects' Award for Design in 1981.The Sisters of Mercy are based in a convent in Bishop Butt Close. There is a Baptist Church in Green Street Green. A church,which is part of St.Giles in Farnborough,was built 25 years ago because of increased population.
